mapper.insert: insert into dms_menu ( id, menu_name, num, menu_pid, lv, menu_url, status, icon, add_time, add_user, update_time, update_user ) VALUES( #{id}, #{menuName}, #{num}, #{menuPid}, #{lv}, #{menuUrl}, #{status}, #{icon}, #{addTime}, #{addUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser} )
mapper.select:
select from dms_menu where 1=1
order by add_time desc limit #{startPage},${pageRows}
select from dms_menu where menu_pid = #{parentId} order by num asc

select distinct dms_menu.id, dms_menu.menu_name, dms_menu.menu_pid,dms_menu.num, dms_menu.lv, dms_menu.menu_url, dms_menu.status, dms_menu.icon,dms_menu.add_time,dms_menu.add_user, dms_menu.update_time,dms_menu.update_user from dms_role left join dms_user_role on dms_role.id = dms_user_role.role_id left join dms_role_menu on dms_role_menu.role_id = dms_role.id left join dms_menu on dms_menu.id = dms_role_menu.menu_id where dms_user_role.user_id = #{userId} and dms_menu.id is not null and dms_role.status = 1 and dms_menu.status= 1 order by num asc

select from dms_menu LEFT JOIN dms_role_menu on dms_menu.id = dms_role_menu.menu_id left join dms_role on dms_role.id = dms_role_menu.role_id where dms_role_menu.role_id = #{roleId} and dms_role.status = 1 order by num asc
